noDevices.title: No usable devices available
noDevices.description: Make sure your device is in "Debugging" mode and is connected to your computer via a Data cable (not just a charging one).

deviceAuthorization.step1: turn the device on (do not plug it in yet)
deviceAuthorization.step3: connect the device to your pc

bolt1AndRoam1.step1: press the power button (you enter the settings menu)
bolt1AndRoam1.step2: press the power button again (you return to the normal screen)

bolt2AndRoam2.step1: press the power, up and down buttons at the same time (this could be a bit tricky)

mapUpload.title: Map Tiles
mapUpload.description: Upload previously generated map tiles directly to your device. Please choose a directory that contains tiles. Maps are created by using {0}.

selectDirectory.label: Choose directory
selectDirectory.foundTiles: Found {totalFiles} tile(s) with total size of {totalSize}
selectDirectory.noTilesFound: No map tiles found (*.map.lzma), select another directory

routingUpload.title: Routing Tiles
routingUpload.description: Upload previously generated routing tiles directly to your device. Please choose a directory that contains routing tiles. You can read more on routing tiles in the docs: {0}

selectDirectory.label: Choose directory
selectDirectory.foundTiles: Found {totalFiles} tile(s) with total size of {totalSize}
selectDirectory.noTilesFound: No routing tiles found (*.gph.lzma), select another directory

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: Upload map themes. Only VTM themes are supported at the moment ({0}).

selectDirectory.label: Choose directory
selectDirectory.noFilesFound: No theme files found, select another directory
selectDirectory.noThemeFilesFound: Theme should contain: vtm-elemnt.xml and optional COLORS.html and .svg files, select another directory

features.title: Hidden features
features.description: Enable or disable some hidden features.

webserver.title: Web Server
webserver.description: Start Web Server (to stop use "Restart" or "Reboot"). A running web server will stop the device from shutting down automatically.

notAvailable.description: No backup is available, create one. It could take a minute or two, if that doesn't happen try restarting the Wahoo Application from the System section below.

available.description: Backup is available on the device.

download.label: Download
download.note: NOTE: If the destination file already exists, it will be replaced

delete.description: Delete current backup from the device (local files are not removed).
delete.label: Delete

upload.label: Upload
upload.success: Backup uploaded, you may restart the device now
